name: Barrier Relief Moisturizer
usage_note_en: Apply after cleansing, then seal with moisturizer.
usage_note_zh: 洁面后使用，再叠加面霜。
cautions_en: Patch test when skin is highly reactive.
cautions_zh: 敏感期建议先做局部测试。

name: Calm Recovery Serum
usage_note_en: Use once nightly at first, then increase as tolerated.
usage_note_zh: 先每晚一次，耐受后再调整。
cautions_en: Reduce frequency if persistent tingling appears.
cautions_zh: 如持续刺痛，请降低频率。

name: Balance Niacinamide Gel
usage_note_en: Apply a thin layer in AM/PM routines.
cautions_en: Avoid combining with too many actives in one step.
cautions_zh: 避免单次叠加过多功效成分。

name: Daily Bright C Serum
usage_note_en: Use in the morning with sunscreen.
usage_note_zh: 建议白天使用并配合防晒。

name: Refine BHA Lotion
usage_note_en: Start 2 times weekly on non-consecutive nights.
usage_note_zh: 建议每周 2 次，间隔夜间使用。
cautions_en: Do not combine with retinoid on same night.

name: Target Blemish Spot Gel
cautions_en: May cause dryness; reduce frequency if needed.
cautions_zh: 可能偏干，必要时降低频率。

name: Night Retinol Emulsion
usage_note_en: Use at night and increase slowly.
cautions_zh: 孕期不确定时不建议使用。

name: Azelaic Support Cream
usage_note_en: Apply at night on clean, dry skin.
usage_note_zh: 夜间洁面后在干燥皮肤上使用。
cautions_en: Avoid over-exfoliation in the same routine.
cautions_zh: 同套流程避免过度去角质。
